error.message: aria-controls references non-existent id "hidden-categories". Broken ARIA reference provides no accessibility benefit How to fix: - Add element with matching id - Correct the id reference - Remove the broken reference WCAG 4.1.1: Parsing Found: aria-controls="hidden-categories"

aria-controls references non-existent id "hidden-categories". Broken ARIA reference provides no accessibility benefit How to fix: - Add element with matching id - Correct the id reference - Remove the broken reference WCAG 4.1.1: Parsing Found: aria-controls="hidden-categories"

Content may be hidden without visual indication in "Visually hidden utility for screen reader only content .visually-hidden". Text content may be cut off and inaccessible to users. How to fix: - Add "text-overflow: ellipsis" to show truncation indicator (...) - Or remove "overflow: hidden" to allow text to wrap naturally - Or ensure content is accessible through other means (tooltips, expand buttons) WCAG 1.4.10: Reflow

Potential content overflow detected in "h3". This may hide text content inaccessibly. How to fix: - Verify all content remains accessible when overflow is hidden - Consider using "overflow: auto" or "overflow: scroll" for scrollable content - Ensure responsive design allows content to reflow at 320px width WCAG 1.4.10: Reflow

Potential content overflow detected in "p". This may hide text content inaccessibly. How to fix: - Verify all content remains accessible when overflow is hidden - Consider using "overflow: auto" or "overflow: scroll" for scrollable content - Ensure responsive design allows content to reflow at 320px width WCAG 1.4.10: Reflow

Animation without prefers-reduced-motion support. Animations can cause vestibular disorders and motion sickness How to fix: - Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query - Disable or reduce animation when preference is set WCAG 2.3.3: Animation from Interactions Found: File uses transitions without properly disabling them in prefers-reduced-motion: reduce

Font size 11px may be too small. Small text is difficult for users with low vision How to fix: - Use minimum 16px (1rem) for body text - Use relative units (rem, em) for scalability - Test at 200% zoom WCAG 1.4.4: Resize Text Found: ".chip-count"

Highly transparent text is difficult to read. Low opacity reduces effective contrast How to fix: - Increase opacity to at least 0.55 - Use solid colors for text WCAG 1.4.3: Contrast (Minimum) Found: "rgba($color-primary, 0.15)"

Highly transparent text is difficult to read. Low opacity reduces effective contrast How to fix: - Increase opacity to at least 0.55 - Use solid colors for text WCAG 1.4.3: Contrast (Minimum) Found: "rgba($color-green, 0.15)"

pointer-events: none may hide interactive element. Users cannot interact with elements that have pointer-events disabled How to fix: - Ensure element is not intended to be interactive - Use disabled attribute instead for form elements WCAG 2.1.1: Keyboard Found: button styling } } } .gallery-preview-overlay
